powerconsumption: max. 5.5W (max. 8.5W with IR cut filter on)   -W: max. 7W (max. 10W with IR cut filter on)
imagesettings: Saturation, brightness, contrast adjustable through client software or web browser
communicationinterface: 1 RJ45 10M / 100M ethernet interface and 1 RS-485 interface
daynight: IR cut filter with auto switch
protocols: TCP/IP, HTTP, DHCP, DNS, DDNS, RTP, RTSP, PPPoE, SMTP, NTP, SNMP, HTTPS, FTP,802.1x, Qos (SIP, SRTP, IPv6 optional)
minillumination: 0.001Lux @ (F1.2, AGC ON) ,0 Lux with IR 0.01Lux @(F2.0, AGC ON),0 Lux with IR
imagesensor: 1.3 Megapixel CMOS ICR Infrared Network Mini Bullet Camera 1/3" Progressive Scan CMOS
alarm: Motion detection, tampering alarm, network disconnect , IP address conflict, storage exception
